Entry.LogEntry: Player has started the quest, must travel through Uptown to get to Haven

Script.ScriptSource:
DLC01AshurREF.moveto DLC01TP03AshurPlayerWait DLC01AshurREF.evp SetEssential DLC01Ashur 0 SetEssential DLC01Midea 0
;Set Krenshaw and Ashur to be Aggressive and Foolhardy again DLC01KrenshawREF.setav aggression 1 DLC01KrenshawREF.setav confidence 4 DLC01AshurREF.setav aggression 1 DLC01AshurREF.setav confidence 4
;Housecleaning DLC01FrontGateEnterTrigger01REF.disable DLC01FrontGateEnterTrigger02REF.disable DLC01MexREF.addToFaction DLC01CombatRaiders 1 DLC01RaiderGateREF.addToFaction DLC01CombatRaiders 1 DLC01PittGateGuardREF.addToFaction DLC01CombatRaiders 1 DLC01MexREF.addToFaction DLC01PittRaiderFaction 1 DLC01RaiderGateREF.addToFaction DLC01PittRaiderFaction 1 DLC01PittGateGuardREF.addToFaction DLC01PittRaiderFaction 1
set DLC01Quest03.BabyNoiseCount to 30 set DLC01Quest03.BabyTimer to DLC01Quest03.BabyNoiseCount setEssential DLC01Wernher 0 DLC01WernherREF.removefromfaction playerfaction
DLC01DowntownGateToScaffoldsREF.unlock DLC01WernerCribREF.playgroup fastbackward 1
setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 5 1 ;setStage DLC01Quest03 10
;Unlock Doors into Uptown MarketSquaretoHavenPREQ03Ref.unlock SteelMilltoHavenREF.unlock
;Clear beaten slave and other freeforms DLC01FF002VictimREF.disable DLC01FF002GuardRef.disable DLC01FF002EnableMarker.disable DLC01FF005EnableMarker.disable DLC01FF003EnableMarker.disable
;Tell player to retrieve their gear SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 1 1
;Disable fast travel EnableFastTravel 0

Entry.LogEntry: Player has entered Haven, must talk to Ashur at the top floor

Script.ScriptSource: setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 5 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 10 1 SetEssential DLC01Krenshaw 0

Entry.LogEntry: Player has finished talking with Ashur, Ashur is talking with intercom before leaving

Script.ScriptSource:
setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 10 1 setEnemy DLC01CombatSlaves DLC01CombatRaiders setEnemy DLC01PittSlaveFaction DLC01PittRaiderFaction 1 1 if DLC01MideaREF.getDead == 0 DLC01MideaREF.addItem DLC01MideaNoteItem 1 else DLC01MideaNoteBackupREF.enable endif
;Lock Door out of Haven, to keep player from going out into the rioting too soon. DLC01AshurDoor2REF.lock 255
;Disable Adan early DLC01AdanREF.disable

Entry.LogEntry: Ashur has talked to the intercom, made his pitch to the player, and is leaving
Player has found out that the baby is the cure, must decide to kidnap or leave without it

Script.ScriptSource:
setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 20 1 if DLC01Quest03.PathA == -1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 37 1 elseif DLC01Quest03.PathB == -1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 32 1 else setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 30 1 endif
;Unlock door out of Haven DLC01AshurDoor2REF.unlock
;In case the player is trying to be a jerk. DLC01AshurREF.disable

Entry.LogEntry: Player has left without the baby, stuck on Path A - Slaves are now hostile to player. Player must talk to Midea to find Wernher.

Script.ScriptSource:
setObjectiveDisplayed dlc01Quest03 30 0 setObjectiveDisplayed dlc01Quest03 32 1 setObjectiveCompleted dlc01Quest03 32 1
;Set Objective based on whether Midea is alive or not if DLC01MideaREF.getDead == 0 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 70 1 else setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 71 1 endif
set DLC01Quest03.PathA to 1 setEssential DLC01Ashur 1 setessential DLC01Midea 0 setEnemy DLC01CombatSlaves PlayerFaction setEnemy DLC01CombatSlaves DLC01CombatRaiders setAlly DLC01CombatRaiders PlayerFaction DLC01MideaREF.enable DLC01MideaNoteBackupREF.enable DLC01MideaREF.moveto DLC01MideaHutMarker DLC01WernherREF.moveto DLC01WernherHideoutMarker DLC01WernherREF.addscriptpackage DLC01WernherWaitInHideout SetEssential DLC01Wernher 0
;Make slaves aggressive set DLC01SlavesAreAngry to 1
;Remove light terminal DLC01LightControlREF.disable
;Unlock door out of Haven DLC01AshurDoor2REF.unlock
;Clean up DLC01AdanREF.kill

Entry.LogEntry: Player has left with the baby, stuck on Path B (for now), and Raiders are now hostile. Player is instructed to bring the baby to Midea

Script.ScriptSource:
setObjectiveDisplayed dlc01Quest03 30 0 setObjectiveDisplayed dlc01Quest03 37 1 setObjectiveCompleted dlc01Quest03 37 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 75 1 set DLC01Quest03.PathB to 1 set DLC01Quest03.SandraAnger to 1 setEnemy DLC01CombatRaiders PlayerFaction setEnemy DLC01CombatSlaves DLC01CombatRaiders setAlly DLC01CombatSlaves PlayerFaction DLC01MideaREF.enable DLC01MideaNoteBackupREF.enable DLC01MideaREF.moveto DLC01MideaHutMarker DLC01WernherREF.moveto DLC01WernherHideoutMarker DLC01WernherREF.addscriptpackage DLC01WernherWaitInHideout
;kill raiders at the door DLC01AshurPalaceGuard01.moveto DLC01RiotSlave1CREF DLC01AshurPalaceGuard02.moveto DLC01RiotSlave1CREF DLC01AshurPalaceGuard01.kill DLC01AshurPalaceGuard02.kill
;Unlock door out of Haven DLC01AshurDoor2REF.unlock
;Clean up DLC01AdanREF.kill

Entry.LogEntry: Player has talked to Midea, and now knows where Wernher is - either to stop him, or to bring him the baby.

Script.ScriptSource:
if player.getitemcount DLC01Baby == 0 setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 70 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 71 1 setObjectiveDisplayed dlc01Quest03 50 1 Set DLC01Quest03.WernherLocation to 1 else setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 75 1 setObjectiveDisplayed dlc01Quest03 55 1 Set DLC01Quest03.WernherLocation to 1 endif
;enable wernher defenses in Steel Mill Exterior DLC01SMEWernherEnablerREF.enable

Entry.LogEntry: Player has talked to Wernher, and must now make a choice to help him or oppose him

Script.ScriptSource: if DLC01Quest03.PathA == -1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 97 1 elseif DLC01Quest03.PathB == -1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 92 1 else setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 90 1 endif

Entry.LogEntry: Player has killed Wernher or convinced him to leave, now stuck on Path A

Script.ScriptSource:
if player.getItemCount DLC01Baby > 0 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 90 0 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 92 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 92 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 100 1 DLC01AshurREF.enable DLC01AshurREF.moveto DLC01TP03AshurPlayerWait DLC01SandraREF.stopcombat DLC01SandraREF.removefromfaction DLC01PittRaiderFaction DLC01SandraREF.moveto DLC01SandraWaitMarker else setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 50 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 190 1 DLC01AshurREF.enable DLC01AshurREF.moveto DLC01TP03AshurPlayerWait endif HaventoAshurPalaceREF.unlock setEssential DLC01Ashur 1 setEssential DLC01Sandra 1 setessential DLC01Midea 0
;Remove light terminal DLC01LightControlREF.disable
DLC01AshurChairREF.enable

Entry.LogEntry: Player has given the baby to Wernher, now stuck on Path B - told about light controller

Script.ScriptSource:
player.removeitem DLC01Baby 1 1 showMessage DLC01BabyDrop DLC01WernerCribREF.playGroup Backward 1 ;player.additem DLC01Scrambler 1 ;HaventoAshurPalaceREF.unlock Player.additem DLC01powerplantkey 1 DisableNavMesh 0202B757 setObjectiveDisplayed dlc01quest03 105 1
setObjectiveDisplayed dlc01quest03 90 0 setObjectiveDisplayed dlc01quest03 97 1 setObjectiveCompleted dlc01quest03 97 1
setEssential DLC01Wernher 1
DLC01AshurChairREF.enable

Entry.LogEntry: Player has returned the baby to Ashur's crib

Script.ScriptSource: DLC01AshurREF.enable DLC01AshurREF.moveto DLC01TP03AshurPlayerWait setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 100 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 190 1 setEnemy DLC01CombatRaiders PlayerFaction 1 1 setEnemy DLC01CombatSlaves DLC01CombatRaiders 1 1 DLC01SandraREF.addtofaction DLC01PittRaiderFaction 0

Entry.LogEntry: Player has deactivated the lights, and must exit Haven

Script.ScriptSource:
;Lights go out! setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 105 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC01Quest03 195 1
;Ashur & Sandra's confrontation if getDeadCount DLC01Ashur == 0 DLC01AshurREF.enable DLC01AshurREF.moveto DLC01AshurConfrontMarker DLC01AshurREF.addscriptPackage DLC01TP03ConfrontPlayer endif if getDeadCount DLC01Sandra == 0 DLC01SandraREF.enable DLC01SandraREF.moveto DLC01SandraConfrontMarker DLC01SandraREF.addscriptPackage DLC01TP03SandraConfrontPlayer endif
DLC01WernherREF.moveto DLC01TP03SlaveMeetingMarker DLC01WernerCribREF.disable DLC01MideaBabyStuffEnabler.enable
;Disable riot slaves DLC01RiotSlave1AREF.disable DLC01RiotSlave1BREF.disable DLC01RiotSlave1CREF.disable DLC01RiotSlave2AREF.disable DLC01RiotSlave2BREF.disable DLC01RiotSlave2CREF.disable DLC01RiotSlave3AREF.disable DLC01RiotSlave3BREF.disable DLC01RiotSlave3CREF.disable
;Jesse's Section
DLC01SlaveRebellionEnableMarker.enable ;this sets up the downtown ;slaves and raiders to fight and take appropriate locations
DLC01DowntownRaider04.kill DLC01DowntownRaider06.kill DLC01JacksonRef.kill DLC01HarrisRef.kill DLC01DukeRef.kill DLC01VikiaRef.kill
;The following is prep for setting up the uptown trog invasion DLC01AshurPalaceGuard01.kill DLC01AshurPalaceGuard02.kill
DLC01LightsOutRaiderSwap.enable
if DLC01SquillREF.getDead == 1 DLC01SquillReplacement.enable endif
if DLC01MonaRef.getDead == 1 DLC01MonaReplacement.enable endif
if DLC01ReddupRef.getDead == 0 DLC01ReddupReplacement.disable endif
if DLC01ODogRef.getDead == 0 DLC01ODogReplacement.disable endif

;Now you get rewards. ;Player.addperk DLC01BoosterShot - ADDED DURING DIALOGUE Player.addnote DLC01MillAmmoNote RewardXP 150 player.scaonactor PittWorldtoMarketSquareREF.unlock DLC01DowntownGateREF.unlock
setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 190 1 stopQuest DLC01Quest03 startQuest DLC01Quest03fin
setessential DLC01Midea 0 setessential DLC01Wernher 0 setessential DLC01Ashur 0 setessential DLC01Sandra 0 setessential DLC01Everett 0
DLC01TrainYardMapMARKER.Enable
;Remove light terminal DLC01LightControlREF.disable
;Add Ashur and Sandra to appropriate factions, now that you can DLC01AshurREF.addtofaction DLC01PittRaiderFaction 1 DLC01SandraREF.addtofaction DLC01PittRaiderFaction 1
;Restore neutral faction relations setEnemy DLC01CombatRaiders PlayerFaction 1 1
;Re-enable fast travel EnableFastTravel 1
;Achievement! AddAchievement 57
;Remove baby, just in case. player.removeitem DLC01Baby 1 1

;Now you get rewards Player.addperk DLC01BoosterShot ShowMessage DLC01PerkBoosterShotMessageBox Player.addnote DLC01MillAmmoNote RewardXP 150 player.scaonactor PittWorldtoMarketSquareREF.unlock DLC01DowntownGateREF.unlock
setObjectiveCompleted DLC01Quest03 195 1 stopQuest DLC01Quest03 startQuest DLC01Quest03fin
;Make people non-essential anymore setessential DLC01Midea 0 setessential DLC01Wernher 0 setessential DLC01Ashur 0 setessential DLC01Sandra 0 setessential DLC01Everett 0
DLC01TrainYardMapMARKER.Enable
;Restore neutral faction relations setEnemy DLC01CombatSlaves PlayerFaction 1 1
;Re-enable fast travel EnableFastTravel 1
;Achievement! ;AddAchievement 57
;Disable slave in stockade DLC01SlaveStockadeREF.kill DLC01KaiREF.kill DLC01AdanREF.kill DLC01SpectatorMasterREF.disable
;Remove baby, just in case. player.removeitem DLC01Baby 1 1

Entry.LogEntry: (No paths can be completed, quest failed, end DLC main quest)

Script.ScriptSource: showMessage DLC01QuestFailedBabyMessage if player.getitemcount DLC01Baby > 0 DLC01MideaHutMarker.placeatme DLC01Beth endif stopQuest DLC01Quest03 DLC01AshurRef.enable

Objective.Description: Find out Wernher's location from Midea.
Find the cure in Ashur's palace.
Kidnap the baby and leave OR leave without the baby.
Give Wernher the baby, OR stop Wernher.
Return the baby to her home.
Shut off power for Uptown's lights.
Search Midea or her room for clues about Wernher's location.
Go through Uptown and enter Haven.
